https://tmrev.io/movie/627648-Ears, Eyes and Throats: Restored Classic and Lost Punk Films 1976-1981 2022-11-27
xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/627648-Ears, Eyes and Throats: Restored Classic and Lost Punk Films 1976-1981 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/tngAPBSMYI8AJgyG8ElOWERfKfL.jpg This collection of short films represents a hint of the tectonic shift in the underground film world in connection with the punk rock “movement.” Restored from original negatives, it showcases the reasonably well-known alongside the extremely rare, from music shorts to impressionistic documentary. Ears, Eyes and Throats: Restored Classic and Lost Punk Films 1976-1981
